author: gregames
msg: change u_int32_t to apr_uint32_t to allow mod_specweb99 to compile against
Reviewed by:  Sander Temme, Greg Ames

author: trawick
msg: fix the interface to PEM_read_bio_X509() with OpenSSL versions older than 0.9.4.

author: trawick
msg: mod_ssl uses free() inappropriately in several places, to free
memory which has been previously allocated inside OpenSSL.
Such memory should be freed with OPENSSL_free(), not with free().

author: martin
msg: csd and dupped_csd are sockets, so they ought to handled in ap_note_cleanups_for_socket().
(Not noticed before because ap_note_cleanups_for_socket() and ap_note_cleanups_for_fd() simply close the fd,
except for OSs where closesocket() in different from close())

author: stoddard
msg: Fix a segfault when the client closes the connection prematurely.
